name: SubPlay - Mac movieplayer with subtitles
short_description:
Use SubPlay to look at your movies with subtitles on your Mac (Mac OS X or 9 and maybe) and it'll maybe support Windows later...
SubPlay is being developed with RealBasic (download here: www.realsoftware.com)
All of the most common subtitletypes shoul
